text: some are 2 years, some are 1 year - it varies based on how frequently the content/tools change
A great reason to just not get certified, I think I currently have 0 certs, used to have 1 but I think it expired
I want to get all of them, but yeah, going to be a pain to have to re-cert every year, since there are like 22. Oh well, I’ll just hope most are 2+ years I guess.
I used to renew them in batches, but this year I started renewing 1/week and it makes it easier to manage, and lets me skip a week here and there too
